title: Introducing Bourbon Pursuit
description:
Bourbon Pursuit is your source for the best in news, reviews, and interviews with people making the bourbon industry happen. The show dives into bourbon culture with informed, captivating, and casual dialogue. Join hosts Kenny Coleman, Ryan Cecil, and Fred Minnick as they talk with prominent guests and tackle critical American whiskey issues.
Catch all new episodes every Thursday with special Whiskey Quickie reviews on Tuesday and the latest news with This Week in Bourbon on Friday
